mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_applied (applied_code, user_code, board_code, applied_text, create_date, update_date) VALUES (#{appliedCode}, 75, #{boardCode}, #{appliedText}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT bm.board_code as boardCode, um.user_nickname as userNickname, ba.applied_code as appliedCode, ba.applied_text as appliedText, bm.create_date as createDate, bm.update_date as updateDate (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_applyed ba WHERE ba.board_code = bm.board_code) AS commentCount FROM board_applied ba JOIN user_mst um ON ba.user_code = um.user_code JOIN board_mst bm ON ba.board_code = bm.board_code WHERE ba.applied_code = #{boardCode} ORDER BY ba.create_date DESC
